dialog.translation_fallback_info: The application will continue using English as fallback for missing translations.

messages.java_not_found: Java is not installed or not accessible. Please install Java to run Minecraft servers.
messages.invalid_port: Server bound ports must be numeric
messages.settings_reset: Settings have been reset to default values. The application will restart.
messages.restart_required: Please restart the application for language changes to take effect.
messages.config_invalid: The configuration file is invalid. Reverting to default configuration.
messages.close_confirmation: Server is still running. Are you sure you want to exit?
messages.permission_error: Permission denied. Please check file permissions.
messages.invalid_port_numeric: Server bound ports must be numeric.
messages.invalid_port_range: Server bound ports must range from 2000 to 65535.
messages.invalid_name: Your server profile needs a name.
messages.invalid_server_folder: You must specify a server folder to create a server profile.
messages.invalid_server_no_jar: This folder does not contain a compatible Minecraft server.

about.title: About TruthWeb Launcher
about.description: A Minecraft server launcher and management tool
about.author: Created by: TMH
about.link_confirmation:
You are about to access our {link_text}. This will open your web browser.

Do you want to continue?

system_tray.server_running_notification: Since the server is still running, Launcher is sitting in your tray.

errors.config_invalid: The configuration file is invalid. Reverting to default configuration.
errors.no_server_info: No server information available to start.
errors.system_tray_unavailable: System tray not available. Application will exit.
errors.port_not_numeric: Server bound port must be numeric.
errors.port_out_of_range: Server bound port can only range from 2000 to 65535.
errors.factory_reset_success: Settings have been reset to default values.
errors.log_init_failed:
Could not initialize log file. Continuing without logging.
Details: {error}
errors.process_start_failed:
Unable to start server process.
Details: {error}
errors.java_not_accessible:
Java is not available on this system.

To fix this:
1. Install Java (OpenJDK or Oracle JDK)
2. Make sure Java is in your system PATH
3. Restart the launcher after installing Java
errors.java_not_found_notification: Java not found. Server cannot start.
errors.version_config_missing_msg:
Version '{version_name}' configuration file is missing.

Expected location: {path}

To fix this:
1. Make sure the version folder exists in the versions directory
2. Ensure the manifest.json file is present
3. Consider re-adding this version to the launcher
errors.server_directory_missing_msg:
Server directory does not exist:
{location}

To fix this:
1. Create the missing directory
2. Copy your server files to this location
3. Or edit the server profile to point to the correct directory

The server profile expects to find server files in this location.
errors.server_directory_missing_notification: Server directory missing. Check server profile.
errors.server_directory_access_denied_msg:
Cannot access server directory:
{location}

To fix this:
1. Run the launcher as Administrator
2. Check folder permissions
3. Make sure the folder is not locked by antivirus
errors.server_jar_missing_msg:
No server jar file found in:
{location}

To fix this:
1. Download the correct server jar file
2. Place it in the server directory shown above
3. Or edit the server profile to point to the correct directory

This is usually solved by reinstalling the server. If you choose this method, backup your stuff first.
errors.server_jar_missing_notification: Server jar file missing. Check server setup.
errors.server_jar_corrupted_msg:
Server jar file appears to be corrupted or missing:
{jar_path}

To fix this:
1. Re-download the server jar file
2. Replace the corrupted file
3. Or edit the server profile to point to a different server directory
errors.server_game_folder_missing_msg:
Server '{server_alias}' game folder does not exist:
{game_folder}

To fix this:
1. Create the missing game folder
2. Copy your server world and files to this location
3. Or edit the server profile to point to the correct folder

Go to Servers → Select your server → Edit Profile to change the folder location.
errors.server_game_folder_access_denied_msg:
Cannot access server '{server_alias}' game folder:
{game_folder}

To fix this:
1. Run the launcher as Administrator
2. Check folder permissions (must be readable and writable)
3. Make sure the folder is not locked by antivirus
4. Or edit the server profile to point to a different folder
errors.server_game_folder_access_denied_notific: Cannot access game folder for server '{server_alias}'
errors.server_profile_incomplete_msg:
Server '{server_alias}' profile is missing version information.

To fix this:
1. Edit the server profile
2. Select the correct Minecraft version
3. Save the profile

Go to Servers → Select your server → Edit Profile to configure it properly.
errors.server_profile_missing_msg:
Server '{server_id}' profile configuration is missing.

To fix this:
1. Go to Servers in the main menu
2. Find your server and click on it
3. Edit the server profile to configure it properly

The server needs a proper profile configuration to launch.
errors.permission_denied_message:
Permission denied when trying to start the server.

To fix this:
1. Run the launcher as Administrator
2. Check that the server folder is not read-only
3. Make sure no antivirus is blocking the process

Technical details: {error}
errors.java_error_message:
There was an error with Java when starting the server.

To fix this:
1. Make sure Java is properly installed
2. Try reinstalling Java
3. Check if you have the correct Java version (Java 8+ required)

Technical details: {error}
errors.cannot_update_server_properties_msg:
Cannot update server.properties for '{server_alias}':
{sp_path}

To fix this:
1. Run the launcher as Administrator
2. Check file permissions
3. Make sure the file is not read-only

The launcher needs to update server settings for proper operation.
errors.java_not_in_path:
Java is not installed or not found in your system PATH.

To fix this:
1. Install Java from https://java.com
2. Make sure Java is added to your system PATH
3. Restart the launcher after installing Java

Technical details: {error}
errors.java_not_found_server_cannot_start: Java not found. Server cannot start.

dialogs.server_running_exit: A server is currently running. Do you want to stop it and exit?
dialogs.servers_running_title: You have the following servers running:
dialogs.what_to_do: What would you like to do?
dialogs.server_running_exit_options:
Server '{server_name}' is currently running.
Would you like to exit the launcher?

Yes: Stop server and exit launcher
No: Minimize to system tray
Cancel: Return to launcher
dialogs.servers_stopped_success:
Successfully stopped: {server_list}

You can now launch servers normally from the launcher.
dialogs.stop_failed_manual: Could not stop any running servers. You may need to stop them manually.
dialogs.server_running_exit_confirmation: A server is currently running. Do you want to stop it and exit?
